short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you like car games? Retro Speed 2 is a free racing game. Start your engine, get on the highway. Have fun.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Retro Speed ​​2 is a free racing game. Start your engine, hit the highway, use your mouse or finger to control your car and avoid everything that comes your way. Yes, darling, you're about to make it happen! Retro Speed ​​2 is the long-awaited sequel to the original Retro Speed ​​game. In Retro Speed ​​2 you will be challenged on a never ending road filled with slow moving cars that love to get in your way. Dodge them and you'll be far away. But if you're not careful, one of those idiots could be your doom.

The farther you go, the faster you go, and that's good. This is a game about speed and distance. How long can you go and how fast can you do it? In Retro Speed ​​2 you will avoid cars on the highway to reach your ultimate goal: Victory points. Race your way up the leaderboard by beating the competition and surviving. The longer you survive, the more points you get. Avoid the suckers, stay calm and stay on the run for the number one Retro Speed ​​maniac.


To swipe Install this extension to play Retro Speed ​​2  game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact with us support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
